text: The 2001–02 Missouri Tigers men's basketball team represented the University of Missouri as a member of the Big 12 Conference during the 2001–02 NCAA men's basketball season. Led by third-year head coach Quin Snyder, the Tigers reached the Elite Eight of the NCAA Tournament, and finished with an overall record of 24–12 (9–7 Big 12). ==Roster== ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9| Regular Season |- !colspan=9| Big 12 Conference Tournament |- !colspan=9| NCAA Tournament ==Rankings== ==Awards== 2017-18 Missouri Tigers men's basketball media guide. Retrieved 2019-Mar-29. ==References== Missouri Missouri Category:Missouri Tigers men's basketball seasons
